mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Francis H. Pierpont Civil War Telegrams
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: MacFeely, Robert
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Gov FH Peirpoint [Francis H. Pierpont] Wheeling Aug 23 1861. By Telegraph from Bellair 23 1861. Being an officer of the subsistence department I am prohibited by the general regulations of the army from giving an order to any officer I have therefore no authority to send any officer to muster in a company of volunteers R MacFeely Capt..& C/S 110J85pd
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: MacFeely, Robert
Bellaire, Ohio
Wheeling, (West) Virginia
Pierpont, Francis H.
